actions.recommendation: Your blood pressure was raised. This puts you at risk for future cardiovascular events/ strokes - thus we need to optimise your pressure control. We can help find improved methods of consistently taking your pills daily.
Regular prostate screening is important for early detection of any abnormalities as you get older & improves management outcomes. You can monitor for any symptoms & consult for further review.
Stress also plays a role and finding time to rest is important.
Turmeric/ Ginger/ Black pepper/ Cayenne pepper
